titleAndText.text: We build novel infrastructure, primitives, and game economy design to advance the World Engine ecosystem and crypto gaming as a whole.
titleAndText.title: 001 Research Lab

titleAndText.text: Argus is a games company, not a pick-and-shovel company. We build games on the World Engine stack and trailblaze the path to realizing the Internet of Games.
titleAndText.title: 002 Game Studio

titleAndText.text: We help game studios building on the World Engine go from 0 to 1 through our edge in crypto gaming infrastructure, research, and growth.
titleAndText.title: 003 Game Publisher

titleAndText.text: World Engine’s novel layer-2 sharding architecture empowers game developers to build their own horizontally scalable blockchain that inherits the security of the underlying layer-1 blockchain.
titleAndText.title: Sharded Rollup SDK

titleAndText.text: Inspired by the server architecture behind the most computationally intensive online games, World Engine's game shards allow developers to build their games fully onchain.
titleAndText.title: Made for Games, Not JPEGs

titleAndText.text: Build your rollup on top of the largest blockchain developer ecosystem: Ethereum. The World Engine-based chain is EVM-compatible and supports all Ethereum wallets and toolings.
titleAndText.title: EVM-compatible

content.text: We will be publishing our documentation soon. In the meantime, you can watch a walkthrough of the World Engine

faqFirstColumn.question: Where can I learn more about the World Engine?

content.text: Yes! Once officially launched, World Engine will be fully open source.

faqFirstColumn.question: Is the World Engine open source?

content.text: We are currently onboarding studios to the World Engine on an invite-only basis. If you are currently building a game and interested in using the World Engine, you can reach out to

faqFirstColumn.question: I’m a game studio interested in using the World Engine. How can I get started?

content.text: We are headquartered in San Francisco, CA, but the Argus team is distributed all around the globe.

faqSecondColumn.question: Where is the Argus Labs team based?

content.text: as the primary way for us to communicate with our community of players and developers.

blogEntries.description: Introducing the World Engine by Argus
How to Stop Worrying & Love Execution Sharding

content.text: We are gaming veterans and crypto natives working at the intersection of bleeding-edge applied research, sagelike first-principles reasoning, and incisively thoughtful game design to ignite the next paradigm shift in video gaming.

body.text: An era where the creatives, hackers, and savants will lead the industry once again. Built on an open infrastructure designed from first-principles with both the players and designers in mind, not benjamin's. Together, we'll redefine what it means to create and play video games. Together, we'll germinate the seed for future game worlds.

content.text: It's time for a new era

An era where the creatives, hackers, and savants will lead the industry once again. Built on an open infrastructure designed from first-principles with both the players and designers in mind, not benjamin's. Together, we'll redefine what it means to create and play video games. Together, we'll germinate the seed for future game worlds.
Game developers are locked into platform giants and operate at their mercy.

switchbacks.text: Players are restricted from creating content and platforms that directly hook into core game logic and data.

content.text: Players are restricted from creating content and platforms that directly hook into core game logic and data.

switchbacks.text: Games can't communicate with each other seamlessly, eliminating a treasure trove of game design innovation and embargoing the growth of expansive cross-game economies.

content.text: Games can't communicate with each other seamlessly, eliminating a treasure trove of game design innovation and embargoing the growth of expansive cross-game economies.

dark corners of ![](https://a-us.storyblok.com/f/1006394/158x150/315e51eb11/rune-3.svg) the universe.

switchbacks.text:
The video game industry is built on the shoulders of rebels; those crazy enough to build the impossible and the “uncommercial”.
We are tired of hearing about "how it has always been done"; we want to know "how it should have been done".
switchbacks.eyebrow: FROM MAGNAVOX ODYSSEY TO ULTIMA ONLINE

content.text: The video game industry is built on the shoulders of rebels; those crazy enough to build the impossible and the “uncommercial”. We are tired of hearing "how it has always been done"; we want to know "how it should be done".

switchbacks.text: We are builders of worlds from the wildest of fantasies -- an escape from the mundane reality. But, we grew complacent with the mundane reality that is our own industry.

content.text: We are builders of worlds from the wildest of fantasies -- an escape from the mundane reality. But, we grew complacent with the mundane reality that is our own industry.

content.subtitle: we are building the seed of future game worlds
content.verticalMarquee: We are committed to realizing a future where games are open, interoperable, and shaped by emergent gameplay. At the convergence of applied research and crypto-native tech, we are advancing the way to build, play, and extend games.

body.title: Argus Labs - We are building the seed of future game worlds
